title: U.S. TV viewership selected games 2014 FIFA World Cup in Brazil
summary: This grouped bar chart shows TV viewership in million viewers on the Y-axis for 8 different 2014 World Cup Matchess for 2 groups ESPN/ABC, and Univision that are presented on the X-axis.

In 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN), ESPN/ABC had the highest TV viewership in million viewers 182.0 among the 2 groups and in Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN), Univision had the lowest TV viewership in million viewers 34.0.

In 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC), Univision had the highest TV viewership in million viewers among all 8 2014 World Cup Matchess and it has the lowest TV viewership in million viewers in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN).

2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC) and Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) had the biggest gap of 58.0 between the highest and lowest TV viewership in million viewers found for Univision.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows TV viewership in million viewers on the Y-axis for 8 different 2014 World Cup Matchess for 2 groups ESPN/ABC, and Univision that are presented on the X-axis.

2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) had the maximum TV viewership in million viewers among all 2 groups, and it was for ESPN/ABC. The minimum TV viewership in million viewers was observed in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) for Univision.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows TV viewership in million viewers on the Y-axis for 8 different 2014 World Cup Matchess for 2 groups ESPN/ABC, and Univision that are presented on the X-axis.

In 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN), ESPN/ABC had the highest TV viewership in million viewers 182.0 among the 2 groups and in Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN), Univision had the lowest TV viewership in million viewers 34.0.

In 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC), Univision had the highest TV viewership in million viewers among all 8 2014 World Cup Matchess and it has the lowest TV viewership in million viewers in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN).

2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC) and Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) had the biggest gap of 58.0 between the highest and lowest TV viewership in million viewers found for Univision.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows TV viewership in million viewers on the Y-axis for 8 different 2014 World Cup Matchess for 2 groups ESPN/ABC, and Univision that are presented on the X-axis.

In 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN), ESPN/ABC had the highest TV viewership in million viewers 182.0 among the 2 groups and in Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN), Univision had the lowest TV viewership in million viewers 34.0.

In 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC), Univision had the highest TV viewership in million viewers among all 8 2014 World Cup Matchess and it has the lowest TV viewership in million viewers in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN).

The maximum TV viewership in million viewers for Univision that was found in 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC) was 2.71 times larger than the minimum TV viewership in million viewers observed in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN).

Among all 2 groups, ESPN/ABC had the gap of 138.0 between the maximum and minimum TV viewership in million viewers observed in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) and Opening match - Brazil vs. Croatia (06/12/14)(Univision & ESPN) respectively.

Averaging all 2 groups ESPN/ABC, and Univision, the 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC) is the maximum TV viewership in million viewers and Opening match - Brazil vs. Croatia (06/12/14)(Univision & ESPN) is the minimum TV viewership in million viewers.
